entry.title: Publication
entry.content:
Papers

----------------------------------------------------------------

  • Wu, C.-F., Aoki, N., Takeshita, K., Takeshita, K., Fuke, K., Fukuhara, T., Chiura X.H., Arie T., Komatsu, K., Okada, R. & Moriyama, H. Unique properties of terminal regions, viral proteins and specific rearrangement of segmented double-stranded RNA genomes of Alternaria alternata virus 1 (AaV1), the proposed family Alternaviridae. (In preparation)
  • Moriyama, H., Aoki, N., Fuke, K., Urayama, K. T., Takeshita, N. & Wu, C.-F. 2020. Alternaviruses. Reference Module in Life Sciences: Elsevier. https://doi.org/10.1016/B978-0-12-814515-9.00031-X

 

Presentations

----------------------------------------------------------------

  • 複数の分化型の Fusarium oxysporum から見つかった新規デルタフレキシウ イルスの塩基配列の解析. 岡田亮 ・北浦健太朗 ・呉建甫 ・宮本拓也 ・林可奈子 ・小河原 孝司 ・森山裕充. 日本植物病理学会大会. 2020.🔗
  • Tseng, Y.-W., Wu, C.-F., Lee, C.-H., Chen, Y.-K., and Jan, F.-J., "Development of a multiplex system for rapid detection of viroids in Solanaceae", The Plant Annual Meeting, National Chung Hsing University, Taichung, Taiwan, November 2018.
  • Wu, C.-F., Tseng, Y.-W., Lee, C.-H., Chen, Y.-K. and Jan, F.-J., "Development of multiplex viroid rapid detection system for Solanaceae plants", Taiwan Phytopathological Annual Meeting, National Chung Hsing University, Taichung, Taiwan, April 2018.
  • Tseng, Y.-W., Wu, C.-F., Lee, C.-H., Chen, Y.-K., and Jan, F.-J., " Reverse transcription loop-mediated isothermal amplification (RT-LAMP) method for the detection of six quarantined viroids of Solanaceae simultaneously", Taiwan Phytopathological Annual Meeting, National Chung Hsing University, Taichung, Taiwan, April 2018. 

 

Posters

----------------------------------------------------------------

  • Wu, C.-F., Fukuhara, T., Okada R. & Moriyama H., "Specific genome alterations of segmented dsRNA mycovirus, Alternaria alternata virus 1 (AaV1), causing the morphologies changing in saprophyte A. alternata", The Phytopathological Society of Japan (PSJ), Kanto Online Meeting, Japan, September 2020.
  • Tseng, Y.-W., Wu, C.-F., Lee, C.-H., Chen, Y.-K., and Jan, F.-J., "Development of a multiplex system for rapid detection of viroids in Solanaceae", The 9th International Conference of Clinical Plant Science, National Chung Hsing University, Taichung, Taiwan, December 2018.
  • Wu, C.-F., Tseng, Y.-W., Lee, C.-H., Chen, Y.-K. and Jan, F.-J., "Development of multiplex viroid rapid detection system for Solanaceae plants and seeds", International Congress of Plant Pathology (ICPP), Hynes Convention Center, Boston, US, July 2018.

entry.title: About Me
entry.summary: I'm working on the analysis of the terminal structures and alteration phenomenon of the dsRNA alternavirus genomes. In the future, I will identify the protein functions of the alternavirus, and screen mycoviruses in Rhizoctonia solani strains collected from Taiwan. ---------------------------------------------------------------- 2019 - Present Ph.D.,…
entry.content:
I'm working on the analysis of the terminal structures and alteration phenomenon of the dsRNA alternavirus genomes.                                                        In the future, I will identify the protein functions of the alternavirus, and screen mycoviruses in Rhizoctonia solani strains collected from Taiwan.

 

Education

----------------------------------------------------------------

2019 - Present  Ph.D., Bioproduction science, Tokyo University of Agriculture & Technology                                           Laboratory of Molecular and Cellular Biology                                                                                 Advisor: Prof. Hiromitsu Moriyama

2016 - 2018      M.S.,  Department of Plant Pathology, National Chung Hsing University                                                 Laboratory of Plant Virology and Plant Genetic Engineering                                                           Advisor: Prof. Fuh-Jyh, Jan                                                                                                               Master thesis: Development of multiplex viroid rapid detection system                                         for Solanaceae plants🔗

2012 - 2016      B.S.,   Department of Plant Pathology, National Chung Hsing University

 

Experience

----------------------------------------------------------------

2019 Feb-Sep Research Assistant,                                                                                        Laboratory of Plant Virology and Plant Genetic Engineering, National Chung Hsing University 

2016 -  2018 Adjunct Research Assistant,                                                                          Laboratory of Plant Virology and Plant Genetic Engineering, National Chung Hsing University
